title: Door to Altharia
description: Fourteen year-old Alec Breen yearns for the opportunity to escape his broken family.  On one magical summer night, he meets two otherworldly beings who offer to bring him to their mysterious realm. It seems a dream come true!  But when Alec arrives in Altharia, he finds a world that totters on the brink of destruction, imperiled by an ancient and insatiable evil.  As he struggles to understand his new surroundings, Alec discovers that very little is as it seems in the magical world of Altharia. Each discovery reveals new mysteries, each shadow holds unknown dangers, and Alec finds that he, himself, has an untold story to tell.  Can he help Altharia heal?  Or will everything be lost?
author: Martyn McGrath
